extendedInfo.description: Contains a complete practice test for the Cambridge Advanced (CAE) Use of English Exam. Part 1: multiple choice gaps Part 2: Text with gaps Part 3: Word building Part 4: Gapped sentences Part 5: Sentence reconstruction 50 questions Scoring system Carefully prepared by experts at Exam English, leaders in online test preparation No internet connection required Useful practice for other exams, such as IELTS or FCE
